vsParam:
Here, Cresson.
This is the "liver paste" made by [px]!

*Boo-hoo*... I am sorry, do I have to eat this thing?
It looks... fishy...

Cresson, what are you doing? I am here to check on you,
Who'd know... you are so...
C, captain!? When did you come...

So terrified in front of things you don't like!
That shows you are weak-willed!

I mean... though we who prepared the livers shouldn't say
that... do you think Tandrion said that on purpose?

Er, I think he just said that carelessly...
But I think Cresson will take it seriously...

Captain... I am sorry! That's my fault.
You are right!

It's unforgivable for a guard or a knight to show
weaknesses in front of an enemy!

Captain, please watch!
I, Cresson... will eat all of these!

Er, that's the spirit, Cresson... Titter!
Hehe... alright, finish that dish!

*Sob*... *Sob sob*.
F, finally... I... finished this...
Do you want some more? We still have some.

Er... Thank you, [px]...
It's a hard battle, but I made it...

That's not your feeling about the cuisine, right... (Gulping).
[px], it tastes good, I can assure you. (Chewing).

[px]!?
He... he can't hold it, we, we better let him rest!

Yeah... (Gulping). And the rest are mine,
there's none left for him... (Chewing)

S, Sorel...
I am sorry, but can you eat over there...

Oh my, Cresson gets so exhausted from eating animal livers
despite he pulled through all those tough trainings without
hesitation! This training is too hard for him!

Ha ha ha, well done, Cresson!
You just overcame one of your weaknesses!

Alright, pull yourself together.
You can succeed in anything as long as your are determined!

Thanks, Captain... Now I am one step closer to becoming
the most powerful knight... *Boo-hoo*.

C, Cresson!?
Snap out of it, Cresson!?

Ha ha ha... Who'd know that he'll suffer
like that just by eating animal livers!

But you are really something.
With your determination and hardwork, you will be... Ha ha ha!

Cresson!
I'll use the recovery wizardry to you, hold it up!
